itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss their way too early over/unders of the 2020 NFL season, they decide if a truncated MLB season in July calls for player salary caps, the NBA is exploring resuming play this year, and chat about the big questions surrounding college football amidst confusion over whether or not physical classes will be held in the Fall. 

Mybookie.com - PROMO CODE: DRINKINBROS
